EmailTemplate.description: The e-mail template is used to inform the approver manager that an onboarding request an approval for passing from 3.2 to 3.3 step.
EmailTemplate.name: Onboarding Process 3.2 to 3.3 step approval submission e-mail (text version)
EmailTemplate.subject: [Onboarding Process] Your approval is requested for passing on to 3.3 step
